## PHILIPPINE OSH STANDARDS OVERVIEW

**Legal Basis:** RA 11058 (OSH Law) and OSHS Rules 1020-1960

**Key Rules:**
- Rule 1020: Registration (30 days for new establishments)
- Rule 1030: Safety Officers (SO1-SO4 based on worker count)
- Rule 1040: Health & Safety Committee (10+ workers hazardous)
- Rule 1050: Accident Reporting (24 hrs fatal, 5 days disabling)
- Rule 1060: Premises requirements
- Rule 1070: Environmental control (noise, light, temp)
- Rule 1080: PPE requirements
- Rule 1120: Hazardous work & confined spaces
- Rule 1160: Boiler safety
- Rule 1960: Health services

**Employer Duties:**
1. Provide safe workplace
2. Register with DOLE
3. Appoint safety officer
4. Provide FREE PPE
5. Report accidents
6. Conduct safety training

**Worker Rights:**
- Know workplace hazards
- Refuse unsafe work
- Report safety violations
- Participate in HSC
